trans-unit.source: Exposes <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.ControlType.Document"></xref> control types to [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 公開<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.ControlType.Document"></xref>控制類型[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: The DocumentAutomationPeer represents documents and supports the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern>.
trans-unit.target: DocumentAutomationPeer 代表文件，並支援<xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern>

trans-unit.source: Objects such as a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> or <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument> can contain embedded objects, such as images and hyperlinks.
trans-unit.target: 物件，例如<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>或<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument>可以包含內嵌的物件，例如影像和超連結。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>

trans-unit.source: Initially, when you try to get the child elements of the document, <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer.GetChildrenCore%2A?displayProperty=fullName> does not return the embedded objects.
trans-unit.target: 一開始，當您嘗試取得子文件中，項目<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer.GetChildrenCore%2A?displayProperty=fullName>不會傳回內嵌的物件。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer.GetChildrenCore%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To get the embedded elements, obtain a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRange> from the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern> and call <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRange.GetChildren%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 若要取得的內嵌項目，取得<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRange>從<xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern>呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRange.GetChildren%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRange.GetChildren%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRange>

trans-unit.source: After <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRange.GetChildren%2A?displayProperty=fullName> is called, any elements in that <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRange> are returned by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer.GetChildrenCore%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 之後<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRange.GetChildren%2A?displayProperty=fullName>會呼叫該<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRange><xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer.GetChildrenCore%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer.GetChildrenCore%2A?displayProperty=fullName>所傳回</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRange>的任何項目</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRange.GetChildren%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Unless you know the document is a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument>, you should not call <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRange.GetChildren%2A> on the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern.DocumentRange%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 除非您知道文件是<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument>，您不應該呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRange.GetChildren%2A>上<xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern.DocumentRange%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern.DocumentRange%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRange.GetChildren%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument>

trans-unit.source: If the document is loaded from a network location, calling <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRange.GetChildren%2A> on the entire document is resource intensive.
trans-unit.target: 如果從網路位置載入文件時，呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRange.GetChildren%2A>整份文件上是需要大量的資源。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRange.GetChildren%2A>

trans-unit.source: Instead, you should use one of the methods on <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern> that returns a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRange> that represents a portion of the document.
trans-unit.target: 相反地，您應該在使用其中一個方法<xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern>傳回<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRange>，代表文件的一部分。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRange> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement"> </xref>與此相關聯<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the control type for the control that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得與此相關聯控制項的控制項類型<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType*>.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType*>

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType"></xref> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType"></xref>在所有情況下。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Rect"></xref> that represents the screen coordinates of the element that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Windows.Rect"> </xref> ，代表螢幕座標，這與相關聯的項目<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetBoundingRectangle*>.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetBoundingRectangle*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetBoundingRectangle*>

trans-unit.source: The bounding rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 週框。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of child elements for the <xref href="System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得子項目的集合<xref href="System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement"></xref>與此相關聯<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildren*>.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildren*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildren*>

trans-unit.source: Because <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer"></xref> gives access to its content through <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern"></xref>, this method always returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 因為<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer"></xref>可讓透過其內容的存取<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern"> </xref>，這個方法一律會傳回<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the <xref href="System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得名稱<xref href="System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement"></xref>與此相關聯<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName*>.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName*>

trans-unit.source: A string that contains "Document".
trans-unit.target: 字串，包含 「 文件 」。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Windows.Point"></xref> that represents the clickable space that is on the <xref href="System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Windows.Point"> </xref> ，代表位於的可點選空間<xref href="System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement"></xref>與此相關聯<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClickablePoint*>.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClickablePoint*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClickablePoint*>

trans-unit.source: The point that represents the clickable space that is on the element.
trans-unit.target: 表示項目上可點選空間點。

trans-unit.source: Gets the control pattern for the <xref href="System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得控制項模式<xref href="System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement"></xref>與此相關聯<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個列舉值。

trans-unit.source: If patternInterface is , this method returns an .
trans-unit.target: If patternInterface is , this method returns an .

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer"></xref> is understood by the end user as interactive or the user might understand the <xref href="System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement"></xref> as contributing to the logical structure of the control in the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_gui](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-gui-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否<xref href="System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement"></xref>與此相關聯<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer"></xref>瞭解為互動式的使用者或使用者可能會了解<xref href="System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement"></xref>做為控制項的邏輯結構[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_gui](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-gui-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsControlElement*>.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsControlElement*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsControlElement*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>在所有情況下。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer"></xref> is off the screen.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出是否<xref href="System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement"></xref>與此相關聯<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer"></xref>超出螢幕以外。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsOffscreen*>.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsOffscreen*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsOffscreen*>

trans-unit.source: This property does not indicate whether the element is visible.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性不會指出項目是否可見。

trans-unit.source: In some circumstances, an element is on the screen but is still not visible.
trans-unit.target: 在某些情況下，項目會顯示在螢幕上，但仍看不到。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the element is obscured by other elements, it might not be visible.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，如果項目會隱藏其他項目，它可能無法顯示。

trans-unit.source: In this case, the method returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，方法會傳回`false`。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the element is not on the screen; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果項目不在畫面上否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。
